__e: -Oh, yeah, real Austin is long gone.
If there's anything you think I need to know, tell me.
In case you hadn't noticed, and hadn't, until the waitresses pointed it out to me, Austin is hot.
Why was the letter sent to Austin, not Miami?
This is Austin, this is Travis.
Uh, actually, I'm from Austin. And I think my family are still there. You think?
I have gathered here before me... the world's deadliest assassins... and yet each of you has failed to kill Austin Powers.
Hey, what do you say we get rid of Austin Powers here and go somewhere alone, huh?
Oh, no, Austin Powers, I have your number.
